title: Change application title to Family Journey

requirements.text: Update the HTML document title in frontend/index.html from 'Family Blog' to 'Family Journey'
acceptanceCriteria: The browser tab displays 'Family Journey' as the page title
The title tag in index.html contains 'Family Journey'

requirements.text: Update the header banner or main heading in the Layout component to display 'Family Journey' instead of any existing title text
acceptanceCriteria: The main application header visibly shows 'Family Journey' to users
The title change is consistent across all pages using the Layout component

nonGoals: Changing the color scheme or visual styling
Modifying backend logic or data structures
Altering any functionality beyond the title text
